description: Does exactly what you expect it to do and is actually much easier to setup than the Windows counterparts. I wish it had some extra functionality like auto naming recordings with something meaningful instead of just giving them generic file names. If you are looking for a super simple and easy to use application for your SDR on Linux then this is it!
summary: Does what it is supposed to do!

Any Sdr has a learning curve. Knowing that the app works great had to play with different inputs to get it working correctly. I was able to read data off rtl-sdr, microphone, infrared receiver, magnetic receiver through 3.5mm mic jack, and both cpu,s .

Having been a short-wave radio listener for many, many years, I have always want to get back into it, but the cost of radio receivers has risen to be unreachable! Heard about sdr after surfing through youtube, and decided to try it out. I am running unbuntu with gnome desktop 20.04 with all the latest updates, in bought a rtl-sdr with antenna on Amazon (where else?) and installed the software as described in the quick-start-guide. Installed with no problems, and after a short learning curve, was listening to the local fire/emergency services with no problem! Fantastic pogram and would recommend it to anyone!

I am running GQRX on a Raspberry Pi 400 with an Airspy HF receiver. So far, this composition gives me excellent performance on listening to FM broadcasting stations. Besides, I can choose the audio output between the Pi built-in HDMI port or my Bluetooth phone set.

I know that the pulse audio can be used to install "Virtual sinks" into the system. This gives me another chance to route audio to decode WSPR signals using WSJT-X on HF. As well, the UDP streaming might also allow me to observe local APRS packets if I can build DireWolf from source. OK, I'll try to make them to work together.

Thank you to authors for providing us with these excellent software products.

I use this program daily and absolutly love it! One note on this release: Direct sampling is broken, so I can not receive HF frequescies in direct sampling mode. It is my understanding that this has been fixed in later releases.
